rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu-compliant placement to the north for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Contemporary design with large windows for natural light, positioned in the west as per modern aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room and kitchen area, ensuring a harmonious flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Well-planned with an island and ample counter space, placed in the northeast corner per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Modern entertainment area with soundproofing, located in a quiet section of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Vastu-aligned guest room facing east to welcome guests, ensuring privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Washroom
rooms.description: Functional restroom area with natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and a private balcony, oriented to the south for cooling breezes.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern, functional bathroom adjoining the master bedroom.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom located in a quiet corner of the first floor for privacy and relaxation.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Utilitarian space for extra storage needs, integrated within the floor plan.
